results.title: Discolocos
results.overview: The high energy movement in Mexico is visited without prejudice through its places and its protagonists. The icon Pascal Languirand is one of them.

results.title: Panarzo and the Good Ol' Days
results.original_title: Panarzo and the Good Ol' Days
results.overview: Chris is haunted by his past and decisions throughout the rest of eternity after his friend, Panarzo, was killed before the war.  Chris is now plagued by endless visions and madness in the world surrounding him.  Can he truly escape them?  What is it we're really seeing?

results.title: Fate/Grand Order: First Order
results.overview: The year 2015 CE.  The last era in which magecraft still thrived.  The Chaldea Security Organization was founded to focus on preserving the continuation of human history. They observe a world which magecraft couldn't observe and science couldn't measure all to prevent the certain extinction of humanity.  But one day, the future that Chaldea continued to observe disappears and humanity's extinction in 2017 becomes clear. Rather, it had already happened.  The cause seems to be related to Fuyuki, a provincial town in Japan, in the year 2004 CE. There, an "unobservable region" that had not existed before appears.  Based on the assumption that Fuyuki is the reason for humanity's extinction, Chaldea issues an order to explore, investigate, and possibly destroy this singularity – a quest for the Holy Grail, the Grand Order.

results.title: The Grand Tour: The Beach (Buggy) Boys
results.original_title: The Grand Tour: The Beach (Buggy) Boys
results.overview: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May are challenged to complete an epic journey across Namibia in three beach buggies, each built to their personal spec. What starts off as a simple determination to win an argument with their boss turns into an amazing adventure across some of the most incredible desert scenery Africa has to offer.

results.title: Fox Trap
results.overview: After a terrible accident leaves a young girl disabled, five years later, the group responsible are invited to a remote manor house in the countryside for a class reunion. Little do they know, they are being targeted by a masked maniac hell bent on revenge.

results.title: Peter Pan Goes Wrong
results.overview: The Olivier Award-winning Mischief Theatre brings Peter Pan Goes Wrong to BBC One. As part of its commitment to community theatre, the BBC has commissioned The Cornley Polytechnic Drama Society, an amateur dramatics group, to recreate the JM Barrie classic as part of their festive programming. But can they pull it off? Narrated by David Suchet and filmed in front of a live audience, watch as Peter Pan flies through the air, Captain Hook and his pirates set adrift in the lagoon, and Tinkerbell is due to light up the stage in a stunning electrical costume... what can possibly go wrong?! With their trademark comic mayhem, expect hilarious stunts, chaos, technical hitches, flying mishaps and cast disputes on the way to Neverland with hilarious and disastrous results.

results.title: The Tank
results.overview: On April 26, 2012, six people entered an Isolated Confined Environment with the mission to simulate a trip to Mars. Their mission was a catastrophic failure.

results.title: Shooting Clerks
results.overview: The biopic of how Kevin Smith bankrolled his $27,000 first film with maxed-out credit cards and became the darling of the Sundance Film Festival when Clerks debuted there in 1994.

results.title: The Evangelist
results.overview: The straightest people can be the most twisted.

results.title: Dinner for One à la Netflix
results.original_title: Dinner for One à la Netflix

results.title: Iruvar Ullam
results.overview: Iruvar Ullam (English: Two Hearts) is an upcoming Tamil romantic musical film directed and filmed by Ramesh G, starring Vinay Rai, Payal Rajput and Archana Gupta.

results.title: Sivappu Enakku Pidikkum
results.overview: A journalist visits the red light area in Chennai to write a novel about the life of the sex workers. There, Mahima, a prostitute, tells him about their lives and the five men who visit them.

results.title: Aakko
results.overview: Aakko is an upcoming Tamil comedy drama film directed by Shyam Kumar and produced by Deepan Boopathy and Ratesh Velu. The film features newcomers Geethan Britto and Tulika Gupta in the leading roles with Arjunan and Swaminathan in pivotal roles, while Anirudh Ravichander composes the film's music and plays a guest appearance.

results.title: Amali Thumali
results.overview: Amali Thumali is an upcoming Tamil comedy film directed by K. S. Adhiyaman and produced by Jeevagan. The film features Nakul and Shanthnu in the lead roles, while Swati plays a pivotal role

results.title: Saaindhaadu Saaindhaadu
results.overview: Saaindhaadu Saaindhaadu (In English ‘Play on Swing’) is an tamil comedy - romance movie. Direction by debutant Ghazali and movie produced by H3 Cinemas.

results.title: Mappilai Vinayagar
results.overview: Mappilai Vinayagar is a 2014 Tamil film directed by Sriram Padmanabhan. The film stars Lollu Sabha Jeeva, Rashmi Gautam, Santhanam and K. Bhagyaraj in lead roles.

results.title: Konjam Koffee Konjam Kaadhal
results.overview: Konjam Koffee Konjam Kaadhal is a 2014 Tamil film directed by Venky. The film stars Hridayaraaj, Aditi Chengappa, Jean Moses and Vishwaa in lead roles.
